problem.markdown:
1. The extremities of any diameter on Mohr's circle represent
(x) Normal stresses on planes at 45 degree () Shear stresses on planes at 45 degree () Principal stresses () Normal and shear stresses on a plane
2. The Grain of a wooden member forms an angle of 15 degree with the vertical. For the state of stress shown determine normal stress perpendicular to the grain?
(x) -2.598MPa () 4.58MPa () 3.34MPa () 5.061MPa
3. For the state of plane stress determine principal stresses?
(x) -28MPa, 132MPa () 09MPa, 325MPa () 28MPa,132MPa () 97MPa, -10MPa
4. Mohr's theorem I gives _____ between two tangents on the elastic line of beams
() Slope () S.F. () Deflection (x) B.M.
problem.p: 1. The extremities of any diameter on Mohr's circle represent

choicegroup.choice: Normal stresses on planes at 45 degree
Shear stresses on planes at 45 degree
Normal and shear stresses on a plane

problem.p: 2. The Grain of a wooden member forms an angle of 15 degree with the vertical. For the state of stress shown determine normal stress perpendicular to the grain?
3. For the state of plane stress determine principal stresses?
4. Mohr's theorem I gives _____ between two tangents on the elastic line of beams
